title: Calls ending/dropping mid conversation pixel 4a
content:
Dear reader, 

Recently (early Feb 21) I bought a pixel 4a in the netherlands. After the update to android 11, I experience that calls suddenly end. The time between the start of the call and the call suddenly ending can range from 2 minutes to half an hour. 

I tried restarting the phone.
Resetting cellular network settings. 
Played around with cellular settings. 
Wifi on or off doesn't matter. 
I can not find a solution to the problem. Do you have any suggestions what to try to get the phone working properly again?

PS network connection is good. I using the  T-Mobile NL network as a T mobile customer. 

Regards
